name: Please Accept Cookies
description:
You find your cookie self in a scary lab turning cookies into mindless killing machines. Armed with an experimental Duality Gun, fight your way through hordes of enemies and reach the exit!

Presented by:

  • Haw Jing Hann
  • Ng Zhi Yin
  • Sylvia Yap (Artstation)
  • Oliver Yeung
